page.title: 04QUEENS PARK
page.content: AN AREA OF TERRACED HOUSING BORDERED ON ALMOST EVERY SIDE BY PARKS OR PLAYING FIELDS, TRINITY UPPER SCHOOLS EXTENSIVE PLAYING FIELDS IN THE S.E. KINGSTHORPE GOLF CLUB AND ALLOTMENTS IN THE N.E.ST. DAVIDS SCHOOL IN THE NORTH AND THORNTON PARK IN THE WEST. IN THE S.W. CORNER IS A SMALL MODERN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE WITH A MIXTURE OF LARGE AND SMALL UNITS FOR RENTAL FOR MANY TYPES OF BUSINESS. IN THE CENTRE IS AN AREA OF PLEASANT WELL- KEPT TERRACED HOUSING AROUND TRINITY CHURCH WHICH WAS BUILT IN 1903. THESE HOUSES ARE WELL-SERVED BY SHOPS ALONG BALMORAL ROAD AND IN KINGSTHORPE HOLLOW NORTH OF KINGSTHORPE GROVE IS THE START OF A LARGE PRE-WAR COUNCIL ESTATE. ALTHOUGH QUITE A NUMBER OF HOUSES ARE OBVIOUSLY NOW OWNER OCCUPIED, RENOVATED AND WELL MAINTAINED, MANY ARE IN A POOR STATE.
